questions.a:
Standard tarot size: 2.75" x 4.75" (70mm x 120mm). This is the most popular size because it:

  • Fits comfortably in average-sized hands
  • Shuffles easily without strain
  • Fits standard tarot bags and boxes
  • Doesn't "shoot off into space" when handling

We specifically avoided oversized formats after research showed they create significant usability frustration, particularly for readers with smaller hands or joint issues.

questions.q: What card stock and finish will you use?
questions.a:
Premium 300-350 GSM card stock with a matte linen finish. This combination provides:

  • Substantial feel without excessive stiffness
  • Smooth shuffling without cards sticking together or flying apart
  • Durability for daily use
  • Matte finish that reduces glare and fingerprints
  • No sharp edges that cause paper cuts

The cards will arrive pre-conditioned for immediate use—no breaking-in period required.

questions.q: Will the card backs be reversible or directional?
questions.a: Fully reversible. The back design reads identically from either direction, so you can't tell if a card is reversed before flipping it. This supports all reading styles, whether you use reversals or not.

questions.q: What kind of packaging does it come with?
questions.a:
The deck includes a rigid box with magnetic closure—significantly more durable than standard paperboard packaging. This protects your investment through:

  • Multiple openings/closings without wear
  • Protection when traveling
  • Secure storage preventing card damage
  • Premium feel matching deck quality

Stretch goals may include fabric storage pouches and travel tins for backers who want additional protection options.

questions.q: Will there be a pocket or mini edition?
questions.a: Potentially as a stretch goal! We're tracking community interest in a travel-sized version (approximately 2.25" x 3.75"). If you'd like to see this option, let us know in comments or through our newsletter feedback.
